snippet: Despite missing most of last season, outfielder Nolan Reimold more than doubled his salary when he agreed to a one-year, $1 million contract with the Baltimore Orioles.
lead_paragraph: Despite missing most of last season, outfielder Nolan Reimold more than doubled his salary when he agreed to a one-year, $1 million contract with the Baltimore Orioles.

headline.main: Reimold Agrees to Salary with Orioles
